_instructions.description: Holiday configuration template for Miti calendar
_instructions.format: Each year (Nepali BS) contains an array of holiday objects

fields.name: Holiday name (preferably in both Nepali and English script)
fields.date: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format using Nepali (Bikram Sambat) calendar

usage: 1. Copy this template to create your custom holidays file
2. Replace the example holidays with your own
6. Rebuild the application: npm run build:extension
notes: Dates must be in Nepali (Bikram Sambat) calendar format
Holiday dates within each year must be valid Nepali calendar dates
You can include multiple years in a single file
Use Devanagari script for Nepali names for better visual appearance
